name: Kamikaze: The Safest Platformer
description: Welcome to the safest/easiest platformer ever! Or... Is it? I'm sorry but i don't know if i can use Godot web export to put it on itch.io. But anyways, you can still download the game. If this is a let down just because you cannot play it in the browser, i highly recommend you download the game anyways. It took me quite a while to make so please keep an open mind.
